title: Subtle Ori and the Blind Forest reference in Kindred?
body:
http://i.imgur.com/C2gY1rV.jpg[/img] to http://i.imgur.com/XezDVzR.jpg[/img]

Pls tell me I'm not crazy and they do have similar art themes/style and shiez. Pls.

replies.body: I swear Ori and the blind forest is just a huge league reference, there are enemies referring to velkoz, the gromp, bard, reksai, and khazix.
Her voice and sound effects instantly reminded me of Ori
Oh my goodness I hear it now :O
Sorry, but its not Ori and the blind forest. Its look like more Princess Mononoke

> [{quoted}](name=Xxgabx,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=XEvkwmmA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-22T21:48:11.832+0000)
>
> Sorry, but its not Ori and the blind forest. Its look like more Princess Mononoke

Wasn't saying that it WAS, I'm saying it looks similar. I've seen Princess Mononoke pics and stuff, but Ori seems more closely resembled IMO.
Same thought here. I bet that a few developers of Kindred were inspired by the epic art of ori and the blind forest.
It sure is some epic art. I really wouldn't mind if they did get inspired by Ori. It's an amazing game.
for me is like a mix...of princess mononoke,ori and the blind forest and james zapata moon and crow.

> [{quoted}](name=Leu07,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=XEvkwmmA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-16T03:43:04.286+0000)
>
> for me is like a mix...of princess mononoke,ori and the blind forest and james zapata moon and crow.

Oooh yeah I see that!
